title: Some Fan Art of My Favorite Yordles!

embed.description: I've been meaning to make some art of two of my favorite League champions. Lulu is my favorite support (though Lux and Sona come really close, but I usually play them as more of mages than supports) and Veigar is my favorite mage. <3 Something about the outcast yordles is so hard to resist.

body: Veigar and Lulu are seriously the best champions for me. So much fun with all their personality and their great skills. Hope you all like this piece I created! {{champion:117}} {{champion:45}}

replies.body: I love this - from Lulu's rosy cheeks to Veigar's seriously unimpressed expression :D  You've got a lovely style going!
Very cute :3 They're my favorite, too! At least Lore-wise.
Veigar and Lulu are the best! Lulu is the only reason I still play League of Legends XD
